description:
Genvara Cheng (his family name is mentioned only in the manga) is a member of the http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Magician`s Guild] and the original wielder of the Imperial Sword Jesso. His successor for this weapon later became http://anidb.net/ch25715 [Lum Cheng] (so apparently they`re family but the exact relation is never disclosed). He was very close with http://anidb.net/ch13448 [Isozaki Mana] (but again the details are never fully disclosed).
Genvara was killed by Mana while she was under control of the Demon Sword Medium.
name: Genvara
